Title: Lifeline
Plot: As Tina finds herself attracted to men, Bette explores Buddhism and also hears good news on the work front. Both Alice and Kit try out speed-dating; Kit with Angelica's male nanny Angus and Alice with a lesbian vampire. Meanwhile, Dana receives devastating news about her illness, Helena pursues documentarist Dylan Moreland, Moira goes out as Max, and Shane's ex drops by to see her.
GuestStars: Andrew McNee,  Denis Krasnogolov,  Andrew Airlie,  Tara Janicki,  Adam Thomas,  Tammy Gillis,  David Lewis,  Paul Popowich,  Brendan Penny,  Derek McIver,  Erica Cerra,  Keram Malicki-Sanchez,  Ann-Marie MacDona
